prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful demeanor and a round body shape.
Imagine a cute Pokemon with blue fur and white accents, perfect for aquatic adventures.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small, round creature with cheerful eyes and a bubbly personality.
Generate a character design for a Pokemon that enjoys swimming in the sea and playing in the waves.
Make a Pokemon that has big ears, a fluffy tail, and a love for splashing in puddles.
Design a friendly Pokemon that loves to explore wetlands and has a playful attitude.
Give me a Pokemon that is blue and white, with a round shape and a knack for finding hidden treasures.
